{
    "common": {
        "status_of_key": "recursive",
        "value_of_key": {
            "follow": {
                "status_of_key": "added",
                "value_of_key": false
            },
            "setting1": {
                "status_of_key": "unchanged",
                "value_of_key": "Value 1"
            },
            "setting2": {
                "status_of_key": "removed",
                "value_of_key": 200
            },
            "setting3": {
                "status_of_key": "changed",
                "value_of_key": {
                    "new_value": null,
                    "old_value": true
                }
            },
            "setting4": {
                "status_of_key": "added",
                "value_of_key": "blah blah"
            },
            "setting5": {
                "status_of_key": "added",
                "value_of_key": {
                    "key5": "value5"
                }
            },
            "setting6": {
                "status_of_key": "recursive",
                "value_of_key": {
                    "doge": {
                        "status_of_key": "recursive",
                        "value_of_key": {
                            "wow": {
                                "status_of_key": "changed",
                                "value_of_key": {
                                    "new_value": "so much",
                                    "old_value": ""
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    },
                    "key": {
                        "status_of_key": "unchanged",
                        "value_of_key": "value"
                    },
                    "ops": {
                        "status_of_key": "added",
                        "value_of_key": "vops"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
    "group1": {
        "status_of_key": "recursive",
        "value_of_key": {
            "baz": {
                "status_of_key": "changed",
                "value_of_key": {
                    "new_value": "bars",
                    "old_value": "bas"
                }
            },
            "foo": {
                "status_of_key": "unchanged",
                "value_of_key": "bar"
            },
            "nest": {
                "status_of_key": "changed",
                "value_of_key": {
                    "new_value": "str",
                    "old_value": {
                        "key": "value"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
    "group2": {
        "status_of_key": "removed",
        "value_of_key": {
            "abc": 12345,
            "deep": {
                "id": 45
            }
        }
    },
    "group3": {
        "status_of_key": "added",
        "value_of_key": {
            "deep": {
                "id": {
                    "number": 45
                }
            },
            "fee": 100500
        }
    }
}
